blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I’m late to this drama but friendly reminder that planning a world tour ain’t fucken easy and sometimes shit is gonna go wrong...
body: I’m late to this drama but friendly reminder that planning a world tour ain’t fucken easy and sometimes shit is gonna go wrong and dates/locations are gonna fall through. And not always at perfect convenient times. It happens. The merging of the 12th and 13th shows isn’t the end of the world. If the TBC dates can’t get worked out, it won’t be the end of the world. Not everything works out. That’s just how life is. And I’m sure Dan and Phil are working hard to get everything sorted and keep people updated as best they can.

reblog.comment: I’m late to this drama but friendly reminder that planning a world tour ain’t fucken easy and sometimes shit is gonna go wrong and dates/locations are gonna fall through. And not always at perfect convenient times. It happens. The merging of the 12th and 13th shows isn’t the end of the world. If the TBC dates can’t get worked out, it won’t be the end of the world. Not everything works out. That’s just how life is. And I’m sure Dan and Phil are working hard to get everything sorted and keep people updated as best they can.

And not always at perfect convenient times. It happens. The merging of the 12th and 13th shows isn’t the end of the world. If the TBC dates can’t get worked out, it won’t be the end of the world. Not everything works out. That’s just how life is. And I’m sure Dan and Phil are working hard to get everything sorted and keep people updated as best they can.

summary: Dan and Phil really have to improve their communication skills. It's something I repeated for days in March after Dan's cursed...
body:
Dan and Phil really have to improve their communication skills. It’s something I repeated for days in March after Dan’s cursed liveshow mess and ALSO when Dan released his merch and people freaked out because they thought that meant dnp were parting ways. They should’ve taken those situations as lessons to be more talkative when issues or concerns come up.

Now, in this situation it’s not their fault if the Manila show got cancelled; I believe they did everything they could to still perform on the 12th because they’re good guys who genuinely care, but I do think they need to work more on how to drop informations to their audience and respond to the questions people might have. Dropping a tweet with barely any info and an emoji at the end can’t be enough and I wish they would realize that.

Dropping a tweet with barely any info and an emoji at the end can’t be enough and I wish they would realize that.

Dan and Phil really have to improve their communication skills. It’s something I repeated for days in March after Dan’s cursed liveshow mess and ALSO when Dan released his merch and people freaked out because they thought that meant dnp were parting ways. They should’ve taken those situations as lessons to be more talkative when issues or concerns come up.

Now, in this situation it’s not their fault if the Manila show got cancelled; I believe they did everything they could to still perform on the 12th because they’re good guys who genuinely care, but I do think they need to work more on how to drop informations to their audience and respond to the questions people might have. Dropping a tweet with barely any info and an emoji at the end can’t be enough and I wish they would realize that.
trail.content:
Dan and Phil really have to improve their communication skills. It’s something I repeated for days in March after Dan’s cursed liveshow mess and ALSO when Dan released his merch and people freaked out because they thought that meant dnp were parting ways. They should’ve taken those situations as lessons to be more talkative when issues or concerns come up.

Now, in this situation it’s not their fault if the Manila show got cancelled; I believe they did everything they could to still perform on the 12th because they’re good guys who genuinely care, but I do think they need to work more on how to drop informations to their audience and respond to the questions people might have. Dropping a tweet with barely any info and an emoji at the end can’t be enough and I wish they would realize that.

blog.name: seinelee
blog.title: SeineLee
blog.description: multifandom imagines i guess i don't know what to do here yet

summary: ii Manila for Sept 12 merged with Sept 13
body:
ii Manila for Sept 12 merged with Sept 13

I can’t go anymore

My excitement and happiness crushed by just one tweet from Philly, I’M NOT BLAMING DNP THO

It’s just…

I was so looking forward it. I refrained from buying a lot of food even though I craved for more to eat, I DIDN’T LET MYSELF STARVE BUT I WANTED LIKE SWEETS AND OTHER SNACKS, just so I could save up for merch.

I persuaded my parents twice— they didn’t let me go to ii last year but this year I got them to say yes.

Twice I’ve been shot down—when my parents didn’t let me go last year and now this.

Twice I’ve grown so happy just thinking of the thought I’d be able to see them even from afar up at the balcony.

Twice I’ve felt disappointment and sadness.

I’m still gonna support and wish dnp the best.

But I’ll let myself grieve.

blog.name: pmlxdjh
blog.title: ☞ № ☜
blog.description:
lauren | 16 | phillie | ii 17/05/18

dan and phil taking over my life since 2013

body:
MANILA👏🏻PHANNIES👏🏻ARE👏🏻ALLOWED👏🏻TO👏🏻BE👏🏻ANNOYED

(i’m not from manila but still)

it’s not dan and phils fault, as they were available however it’s due to technical difficulties.

lots of people who paid for front seats will be pushed back and so will people on that original night.

obviously they’ve waited so long, and to have a stressful experience is so frustrating.

i hope the show goes great for everyone minus the circumstances, im sure dnp will accommodate anything and the shows amazing!

blog.name: it-hitsdifferent
blog.title: I guess I'm a phannie
blog.description: Cass//She/Her

summary: y'all know i love dan and phil... but they better fucking explain themselves and apologize to the fans in Manila as well as the...
body:
y'all know i love dan and phil…

but they better fucking explain themselves and apologize to the fans in Manila as well as the TBC dates… 

y'all going to the shows/wanting to go to the tbc dates deserve to be kept updated in a timely manner. 

Granted, I want to give Dan and Phil the benefit of the doubt… I’m hoping they updated us as SOON as they got the news they were gonna have to merge the two manila shows. I also hope they’re still working hard on the tbc dates for mexico and brazil…

but yeah… I hope they apologize in more than a tweet form.
